recipe_name: Roasted sweet pepper stuffed with couscous and feta
author: James Tanner
method: Preheat the oven to 200C/400F/Gas 6. Roast the pepper on a non-stick baking tray for ten minutes or until it starts to soften. Place the couscous in a heatproof bowl and pour over the hot stock.  Cover with a plate and leave to stand for five minutes. Remove the plate and fluff the couscous up with a fork.   Add the lemon juice and olive oil and season well. Stir through the raisins, coriander and feta cheese then stuff the pepper halves with the couscous. Serve warm or cold.
